name: VideoPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Video Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Video Podcast for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Video Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: video podcast
des: Learn how to pursue your passions in games from interviews with those who are making it happen. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This podcast was brought to you with the hope that we can help support your game by connecting you with the stories and secrets of these incredible people we get to interact with on a daily basis. Please remember to like, follow, and subscribe on all of your favorite socials and #gameop
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
